quote: The business of business is people, not products or services. Take care of the people, and the people will take care of you.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: If I love you, what business is it of yours?
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Business people - Your business - is your greatest prejudice: it ties you to your locality, to the company you keep, to the inclinations you feel. Diligent in business - but indolent in spirit, content with your inadequacy, and with the cloak of duty hung over this contentment: that is how you live, that is how you want your children to live!
author: Friedrich Nietzsche,  Daybreak: Thoughts on the Prejudices of Morality

quote: To create a new business that makes money, and more significantly, employs others, and more significantly, gives a product to a customer that improves their life, is our greatest challenge, our greatest opportunity, and the greatest gift, far greater than any charity that we can give our fellow person.
author: Paul Zane Pilzer

quote: The essence of a successful business is really quite simple. It is your ability to offer a product or service that people will pay for at a price sufficiently above your costs, ideally three or four or five times your cost, thereby giving you a profit that enables you to buy and to offer more products and services.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: To be successful, you have to have your heart in your business and your business in your heart.
author: Thomas J. Watson

quote: No business can be a great success without a great purpose.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Our business in life is not to succeed, but to continue to fail in good spirits.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: What business had I to think of one that never thought of me?
author: Anne Brontë,  Agnes Grey

quote: My own business always bores me to death; I prefer other people's.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Networking is like fishing. Just give some beer and a boat and I’ll be in business.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: What other people think of me is not my business.
author: Michael J. Fox

quote: Being good in business is the most fascinating kind of art. Making money is art and working is art and good business is the best art.
author: Andy Warhol

quote: Business gives you a massive high. Doing a great deal, coming up with an inspirational solution... It's very addictive. But it doesn't last long. In isolation, it's a bit sterile. It doesn't reward the soul.
author: John Caudwell

quote: Earn your success based on service to others, not at the expense of others.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: Office Depot: Taking Care of Business... ...with short breaks, bad management and no job advancement opportunities.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: Making money is art and working is art and good business is the best art.
author: Andy Warhol

quote: Success in show business depends on your ability to make and keep friends.
author: Sophie Tucker

quote: The first step to running a successful business, is printing out pictures of all the luxury items you’re going to buy once you get rich.
author: Jarod Kintz,  How to construct a coffin with six karate chops

quote: Draw the art you want to see, start the business you want to run, play the music you want to hear, write the books you want to read, build the products you want to use – do the work you want to see done.
author: Austin Kleon,  Steal Like an Artist: 10 Things Nobody Told You About Being Creative

quote: I love to compete. To me, business is the ultimate sport. It's always on. There is always someone trying to beat me.
author: Mark Cuban

quote: Every great cause begins as a movement, becomes a business, and eventually degenerates into a racket.
author: Eric Hoffer,  The Temper of Our Time

quote: All lasting business is built on friendship.
author: Alfred A. Montapert

quote: There is an immutable conflict at work in life and in business, a constant battle between peace and chaos. Neither can be mastered, but both can be influenced. How you go about that is the key to success.
author: Phil Knight

quote: Entrepreneurs [10w] A man should be judged by the companyhe sells.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: When I'm out of politics I'm going to run a business, it'll be called rent-a-spine
author: Margaret Thatcher

quote: You can dramatize your ideas in business or in any other aspect of your life. It’s easy
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: Moments are the elements of profit
author: Karl Marx,  Capital, Vol 1: A Critical Analysis of Capitalist Production

quote: Whenever an individual or a business decides that success has been attained, progress stops.
author: Thomas J. Watson

quote: Almost anyone can be an author; the business is to collect money and fame from this state of being.
author: A.A. Milne,  Not That It Matters

quote: The business of art is to reveal the relation between man and his environment.
author: D. H. Lawrence

quote: Starting a business isn't for everyone, and it's not what you should do if you aren't sure what else to do. It requires thick skin and the willingness to carry a great deal of stress, sometimes alone. It's more often a life of failure than a life of success, and the majority of successes came after a long road of disappointment, and often shame.
author: Kathryn Minshew

quote: My store, Wine Library, outsells big national chains. How do you think we do it? It started with hustle. I always say that our success wasn't due to my hundreds of online videos about wine that went viral, but to the hours I spent talking to people online afterward, making connections and building relationships.
author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quote: As I've progressed in my career, I've come to appreciate - and really value - the other attributes that define a company's success beyond the P&L: great leadership, long-term financial strength, ethical business practices, evolving business strategies, sound governance, powerful brands, values-based decision-making.
author: Ursula Burns

quote: I must create a system, or be enslaved by another man's. I will not reason and compare: my business is to create.
author: William Blake,  Jerusalem

quote: To fast track your business and become the Roger Bannister of personal branding, be a connector, accumulator, accelerator and facilitator of relationships.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: No man is a success in business unless he loves his work.
author: Florence Scovel Shinn

quote: Whenever you're successful you owe that success to the people in the community, because they are the ones buying your product.
author: Carl Karcher

quote: As an artist, you want to make good stories and create good art; as a businessman, you want to make money and make sure the investors are happy. The two will always clash, unfortunately.
author: Neil Jackson

quote: A friendship founded on business is better than a business founded on friendship.
author: John D. Rockefeller

quote: Everyone is a salesman, and the product is each person. Personal branding is being conscious to the continual nature of selling yourself.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: If you create incredible value and information for others that can change their lives - and you always stay focused on that service - the financial success will follow.
author: Brendon Burchard

quote: It's a dangerous business, Frodo, going out your door. You step onto the road, and if you don't keep your feet, there's no knowing where you might be swept off to.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien,  The Lord of the Rings

quote: But once you have some success in one style, the business wants to lock you in that vein forever.
author: Richard Marx

quote: Here is my final point. About drugs, about alcohol, about pornography and smoking and everything else. What business is it of yours what I do, read, buy, see, say, think, who I fuck, what I take into my body - as long as I do not harm another human being on this planet?
author: Bill Hicks

quote: I go to sleep in my business suit, because it makes my dreams of success seem more real.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book Has No Title

quote: People don’t buy products—they buy people. It’s called slavery. I mean networking. It’s called networking.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: Life's most persistent and urgent question is, 'What are you doing for others?'
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: I am a work in progress.
author: Violet Yates,  Lost & Found

quote: Learning to celebrate success is a key component of learning how to win in the market.
author: Douglas Conant
